1998.title: I was born!
1998.content: I came to the world to build big things! From Brazil to the whole world...

2017.title: Time to College!
2017.content: Picked my degree in Computer Science since I was 10! Never changed since then.

2020.title: Time to start working!
2020.content: My first experience was in Hotmart working as a Data Analyst, my analytical side was thrilled!

2021.title: Entrepreneurship
2021.content: Then I was invited to cofound an edtech startup. I said yes! I even appeared in multiple local news.

2022.title: Soft Yellow
2022.content: After that period it was time to try something new. That was my software development agency. It was a time of accelerated learning, where I built several projects and learned A LOT about the development world.
